edu.ncsu.csc216.carrental.model.state

Interface RentalState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Available, OutForDetail, OutForRepair, Rented

    public interface RentalState
    The state of a Car in a Car Rental Management system. Classes implementing this interface provide state-specific behavior based on the State Design Pattern.
    Author:
    David Wright

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void detailDone(RentalStateManager mgr)
      Perform the actions necessary to indicate that detailing has been completed.
      java.lang.String rentalInfo()
      Returns a String representing the rental information for a rented car.
      void rentCar(RentalStateManager mgr)
      Perform the actions necessary to rent a Car to a Customer
      void repairDone(RentalStateManager mgr)
      Perform the actions necessary to indicate that repairs has been completed.
      void reportProblem(RentalStateManager mgr)
      Perform the actions necessary to return a Car from a rental with a problem reported.
      void returnCar(RentalStateManager mgr)
      Perform the actions necessary to return a Car from a rental with no problems reported.
